changelog.change: Updated reset settings
By default, splits will now be discarded when Livesplit is reset via the autosplitter
In the autosplitter settings in the "Edit Splits" menu, you can choose whether or not to save splits when automatically resetting
Update values for latest release
Update values for latest release
Update values for latest release
Update values for latest release
Use a signature scan for GWorld
Remove Version selection from settings
Support builds from other PC marketplaces
Minor performance improvements
Changes to simplify updates
Update values for latest release
Remove timer/split functionality in favor of new library
Remove unused parts of the derivative component
Initial support for multiple versions (Steam/Beta/GoG/etc) rather than multiple games
Decouple data types and pointers from settings
Watch all relavent pointers rather than just speed
Add autosplitter functionality
Add reset options
Remove XML-based pointer settings
Use LiveSplit's native component update functionality
Prepare the component for the addition of additional offsets
